text: "One of the Living" is a 1985 song by Tina Turner and was taken from the 1985 movie Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome. It went to number 15 in the United States and Ireland, number 55 in the United Kingdom, number 18 in Canada, number 24 in New Zealand, number 34 in Australia, number 6 in Germany, number 13 in the Netherlands, number 9 in Switzerland and Finland and number 12 in Austria. It won a Grammy Award in 1986. ==Official versions/remixes== * Album Version – 5:58 * 7" Remix – 4:10 * 7" Dub Version – 4:45 * 12" Special Club Mix – 7:35 * 12" Dub – 4:56 * 12" Instrumental – 5:58 ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Tina Turner songs
title: One of the Living
